showerReviews.reviewText: … a contractor to Pilot. Their washing machine was broken, no towels available. Translation: no shower. A contractor acting like a contractor, cutting costs over the weekend vs. getting immediate results today. Consistency is a hard image …

One of best Pilot/flying-j I’ve visited. Clean hot showers. I stoped in for a shower since my fresh water tank in my RV was empty. Has plenty of parking for trucks & Rvs. After my shower, I asked if I could use water to refill my small …
Showers clean long wait will take your points and shower credit just to take one shower.  Had no towels and fan doesn’t work.

Signs on the door that showers are not available. Stood in line to check out and asked the male cashier why we couldn't shower. He said if we gave him a "little tip or something" he could arrange it. Also he would not take the Pilot card to …

… up behind the counter, smoking cigarettes, and watching their children run around the store. They put up a no shower sign at night and claim understaffed. Also, bathrooms were dirty when i arrived here the night before, and still are dirty …
Nice cashiers here, friendly. There are about 50 truck parking spaces. There is no driver lounge or laundry room. The shower I used was clean but had no soap. Not much to do here.........

… at the store to be tired and grumpy but they were very nice, very helpful,bless their heart. Store was spotless and so were the showers. Parking lot was small, access to fuel pumps was a little bit tricky, but fuel prices were good.( …

The men that work here DO NOT CARE ABOUT THEIR JOB!!! Called the store before arriving to make sure that the showers were available. Upon arrival I did not shower until later in the evening because there are only three showers so I figured …

A tall afro-american lady with glasses on duty Monday June 5 2023 told me the store is a Pilot only for fuel not for redeem points or take a shower.
Her costumer service was terrible. Talking on the phone for long while I waited.

Pretty small truck stop, but somewhat clean. Cant get shower through machine because they use keys. Shower was pretty big, but I was pretty frustrated with lack of shelves/hooks. There is literally one chair that you have to put all your …

Didn't make it inside. No truck parking because 80 percent of the spots are dropped trailers, or bobtail. Did have a shower hut outside l, unknown functionality. Don't waste your time even trying here

Excellent parking, fair rates, clean, and secure. A+ overall.

showerReviews.reviewText: What you see that how I received the shower. The towel we're soaked & wet. They were not clean!!! I don't know what kind of joke there playing. But it sad. I took the towel on the try out side the door. They were clean & Dry

Good fuel price. Man Diaper in my trash can. No surprise every single loves has dirty trash cans in shower

Water was hot parking spot smelled like pee

Sure did enjoy my experience. Good rest, shower & eat before driving. I feel like all loves does is take care of me. It's like if the staff does come to work for us truck drivers even though I understand they come for a paycheck to pay the …

We usually never stop here because it's ALWAYS something. This time, the showers are down. How is that? When I parked and checked the app the showers were open. I get my shower bag ready, walk in and all of a sudden they aren't working?! Th …

Was a little nervous at first since i've never used a truck stop shower before , but I was pleasantly surprised . large bathroom shower , very clean , hot hot water and great water pressure . i definitely recommend .

The customer service was good, but while taking a shower I had a cockroach fly and land on my face. The shower had a lot of black mold in it, and this is the smallest parking lot I've ever seen a loves have. I cannot recommend coming here, …

Like many businesses and most truck stops, this truck stop is understaffed (atleast whenever I come here; I've been here about 10 times). The shower assigned me was quite dirty! (I almost didn't use it but I showered quick and got out!). Th …
Loves is my favorite travel center on the road. I always look forward to good service and a nice, clean, hot shower. …

The men's bathroom was nasty. So I decided to purchase a shower. The shower didn't have a single drop of soap, in the shower or by the sink. All the trash cans inside and out are overflowing. The cashier shorted me on my change twice on two …

locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice and clean tons of truck parking. Shower was hot and good to go
David McleanLocal Guide · 833 reviews · 960 photos

… Flying J's in the states! Plenty of parking, friendly staff members, the food looked fresh, they have bean to cup coffee, and they definitely achieved their goal in providing the best shower experience ever! The shower had plenty of hot …
Shower very slow, dryers  broke so towels take forever.  No restaurant like advertised,  so tired  of planning g stops , and wast time, try get something to eat besides th r ir pizza  and crap

Don't go here for a shower,  waited well over an hour because apparently everyone was on break and although all showers were empty- none had been cleaned.  Finally able to get in one and there was NO soap and only Luke warm water.  Coffee …

… jumped in and took care of me. Wow! I've never come across that! Then, the shower attendant was incredibly friendly and outgoing.  Asked if I needed an extra towel, and told me he sanitized everything twice. Very good service.  Thank you!

The cashiers were awesome. The showers left a lot to be desired. No towels or wash clothes, had to go up front and ask. Shower head in disrepair. No maintenance man to be found before or after. The lady's at the counter only good thing …
It is impossible to take a bath to go and rest here. You have to wait more than two hours for a shower, so think about it very carefully.

Clean and nice showers.  Staff seemed harried and disorganized.  There are 9 showers.  There was one person ahead of us.  The guy cleaning them wasn't cleaning one and then letting someone in.. Instead, he cleaned every shower and then …

Went out of route, to pay to park, which would have been fine, but when I got up in the morning, to get a shower, I got told the showers were down until 7am. Would have been nice to know this ahead of time, because I wouldn't have wasted my …

Normally running smoothly. Tonight manager outside chatting as single cashier does her best to clear long line. Meanwhile single employer tries to clean public restroom while drivers wait on shower.  Maybe perk being management at flying j.

showerReviews.reviewText: … has been updated… looks pretty good… seems like they forgot to update the bathrooms and make it to where u can book a shower on the App… as far as the parking goes… good luck… sure was a lot of trucks sitting that wasn’t occupied… also …
Best gas station I stopped by through my whole trip from FL to VA. it's clean, nice staff and they even have a shower, come on! Haha

… "services " First thing look at the towels drivers have to use it looks like stuff I don't wants to used but have no other choice for now, some new truck stops are coming up, I try to use their shower sometimes when I'm in the area
Nice, clean place. Hot showers. The problem is the little red light that looks like a video camera in every shower room. I asked the staff about it and they just looked at me weird.

One of the cleanest pilots I’ve been to inside and out and most importantly the shower area! Staff there is nice and friendly and considering some of the awful pilots I’ve been to during my career the staff here needs a raise!!
Best place to stop get gas etc also in my opinion the people working there where. Nice and respect ful treated me. Good also you. Can pay to take a shower

Worst staff I went to take shower she said we have only one shower and you have to wait none was in showers I saw there are three showers but no body gave me key I waited for 1.5 hrs all there’s showers were empty
Small, not alot of spots. Staff is very friendly. Shower was clean and decent.  No laundry facility.
Shower was clean and hot, and staff was all great. Manager gal was awesome and the guy cleaning the showers did a great job
This is a very small Pilot with limited parking and 4 showers. Staff seemed nice, shower was just OK.

… It looks like they have two showers, and I would bring my own towel if I was desperate enough to shower there. …
This is a smaller truck stop that fills quickly. The shower was pretty dirty and the cashiers talked on the phone the whole time I was waiting for towels and while they waited on customers.

Good place for those who are traveling plus they have a laundry mat and shower
